explanations: When we increase a number by a factor of 10, we add a zero to the right of the original number. In this case, the number 345 becomes 3,540 when increased by a factor of 10.

details.choice_question:
Question: If we increase the number 345 by a factor of 10, what would be the resulting number?
A. 3,540
B. 3,405
C. 3450
D. 34500
